name: Thieves of Seas
description:
Thieves of Seas

There are pirates invading your home cove! Use your cannons, fire barrels, and harpoons to destroy the scoundrels in wave after wave of satisfying ship to ship combat!

CONTROLS:

W/S - increase/decrease speed

A/D - turn port/starboard

SPACE - cannons

Q - fire barrels

R - harpoon

ESC - quit to Main Menu

This game was made in 1 month as part of a school project with Ben Snowden (Sliverimage) and polished later by myself. Enjoy!
